Mayor Jim Ferrell

Welcome,

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  It is a pleasure to welcome you to my official webpage and to the City of Federal Wayâ€™s online home.Â  I hope you will enjoy this page and find it easy to use and informative.

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  Strategically located on Interstate 5 between Seattle and Tacoma in King County, Federal Way is home to 102,000 residents and a Puget Sound population of more than 3 million.Â  Federal Way is known for its majestic views, quality parks and public facilities, and business-friendly environment.Â  Incorporated in 1990, Federal Way operates a Mayor-Council form of government and is recognized for the provision of quality public services, excellent streets and city infrastructure, desirable neighborhoods, and quality public safety services.

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  Federal Way is a community Centered on Opportunity.Â  We have built a brand new Performing Arts & Event Center, which is a regional draw, showcasesÂ national acts, and hosts conferences and events throughout the year.Â  We have built a unique Low-impact development in our urban core, calledÂ  Town Square Park.Â  The park features a spray park, permeable concrete walking trail, great lawn, a playground for kids, and more than 130 beautiful trees.Â  Town Square Park serves as the beating heart of our community and is truly a park for all of our residents to enjoy.Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  With the arrival of light rail in 2026, as well as our continued investment in our downtown, you will see Federal Way transform before your very eyes.

Â Federal Way is a wonderfully diverse community, rich in spirit, with a strong civic consciousness.Â  We haveÂ numerous community groups including a Historical Society, Â active Chamber of Commerce, and great service clubs like the Kiwanis, Rotary, Lions, the American Legion, and VFW, just to name a few.

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  I am proud of the progress we have made in the last decade and I truly believe the best is yet to come. Â Please visit this website often and be sure to check outÂ the many ways we continue to move Federal Way forward. Â 

ThanksÂ for stopping by!
